thread.section_title: PC Game Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PC Game Supply | www.pcgamesupply.com
thread.title: wMicah
thread.title_full: PC Game Supply reviewed by wMicah

author: wMicah
title: wMicah
text: my purchase was that of karma koins for nexon. i have used this website before and had no issue, but couldn't make the purchase right away this time. once i called to correct the problem, i was informed that my account was locked because i was too far away from the ip address i first used when i last made a purchase. my only concern is that i had to call to figure this out as opposed to getting a notification via the website or email informing me of what was wrong. other than that, i am appreciative of the amount of concern they had with my money
